rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0001
rows.name: So your objective was that mech all along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0002
rows.name:
That's right!
We recovered the Vita![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Getting caught by the decoy,
and thinking you've actually won...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0008
rows.name:
True, by stealing that mech,
the Growth operation succeeded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0009
rows.name:
But our objective was the defense of NLA.
That was achieved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0012
rows.name:
And you weren't just running a diversion.
You intended to take this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0015
rows.name:
The main Growth force was wiped out.
And you lost, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0016
rows.name: Return alive and report this situation to your superiors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0017
rows.name: I won't forgive that arrogant attitude![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140100_MSG0019
rows.name:
We can't coexist with you lot!
We just have to keep killing each other until one side is wiped out![ST:wait ]
